PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02552022-03-16,  ,  GAC,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Belarus) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (BELARUS) REGULATIONS in order to add twenty-two (22) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0058 Publication Date: 2022-03-30
AttachmentsAttachment
